text: Christian Adán Ortega Ruíz (born February 25, 1992 in León, Guanajuato) is a Mexican professional footballer who last played for Sonora of Ascenso MX. He made his professional debut with Querétaro during a Copa MX draw against Correcaminos UAT on 31 July 2012. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Mexican footballers Category:Querétaro F.C. footballers Category:Cimarrones de Sonora players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Tercera División de México players Category:Footballers from Guanajuato Category:Sportspeople from León, Guanajuato Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Christian Ortega
